column1: *** The amounts for Gavi are calculated based on projected % contribution by Ghana from 2006 to 2011 in the 2005 Annual report
***From 2012 to 2014 both Domestic and Gavi contributions are stated in full amounts for each vaccine.
***2016  and 2017 figures were obtained from decision letters
***2018 to 2024 figures are obtained from the Ghana co-financing information sheet
***For each year from 2012 to 2015 all the domestic contributions are actual while the Gavi contributions are estimates (in annual reports)
***for each year from 2016 to 2018 all the domestic and Gavi contributions are estimates (in annual reports)
*** Gavi's usual co-financing requirements do not apply to IPV.
*** All figures from 2015 were obtained from decisions letters
***All figures from 2012 - 2014 were obtained from annual reports

*** The Gavi co-financing policy does not apply to the current Gavi support for India as the country is not required to co-finance vaccines. Special arrangements apply as per
Partnership Framework Agreement Annex 6 in decision letter for pneumococcal vaccine
*** All figures are obtained from annual reports
***For each year from 2012 to 2014 all the domestic contributions are actual while the Gavi contributions are estimates (in annual reports)
***For each year from 2015 to 2019 IPV figures of Gavi contributions are estimates found in the 2014 annual report
***For each year from 2012 to 2014 all the domestic contributions are actual while the Gavi contributions are estimates (in annual reports)
***For each year from 2015 to 2017 figures of Gavi contributions are estimates found in the decision letter 2015
